verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We are a moment, You are forever Lord of the Ages, God before time We are a vapor, You are eternal Love everlasting, reigning on high{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy, holy, Lord God Almighty Worthy is the Lamb Who was slain Highest praises, honor and glory Be unto Your name, be unto Your name{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We are the broken, You are the healer Jesus, Redeemer, mighty to save You are the love song weâ€™ll sing forever Bowing before You, blessing Your name{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy, holy, Lord God Almighty Worthy is the Lamb Who was slain Highest praises, honor and glory Be unto Your name, be unto Your name{/lang-eng}
